name: Chestnut & Blueberry
description: Chestnut and Blueberry are two peculiar best friends from a small town who share the same talent for getting into trouble. These good-hearted buddies never have a dull moment, whether they're just grinding through their shift at a local kitchenware store or embarking upon a surreal adventure. In this interactive story, you can help Chestnut and Blueberry get out of yet another jam they've gotten themselves into.
